messages.subject: OT (Sort Of Maybe) - Bullying Stories
messages.msgSnippet: Now I know that unschoolers are unlikely to have to deal with bullying, but at work I ve uncovered three lovely women who bully people!  Thot once I was out of
messages.messageBody:
Now I know that unschoolers are unlikely to have to deal with bullying, but at work I've uncovered three lovely women who bully people! Thot once I was out of school, they went away.

So I started researching it, as i have to make recommendations to the management on how to bring the newly re-organized dep't together, and found www.bullyonline.org and WOW! That's a breathe of fresh air! Racists attack your colour/race. Bullies attack your competence/popularity!

Looking back, in 2 of the last 3 jobs I had, **I** was bullied and thot that was management! Sheesh! What a wimp I was. Went all passive to protect myself (yep, that's on the site as a normal reaction to bullying). Anyway, the web site's author had it reallllly bad at work, lost job, family, the works.

So, I'd like to get bullying stories from you articulate folks. Kids or adults who got bullied. And stories of deling with it - help me with these three "queen bees."

Thanks!
Tim T


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
